title: Emerald Kundan Jadau Haaram with South Sea Pearls - An Enchanting Bridal Statement
materials: South Sea Pearls. Features exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster and brilliance.
features: Intricate Kundan Jadau work, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. Features a floral and paisley motif. The layered design culminates in a detachable pendant with emerald centerpiece and pearl drops. The necklace features a delicate rope-style chain at the top.
description: A timeless heirloom piece showcasing the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry. The combination of Kundan, Emeralds and South Sea Pearls exudes opulence and grace. The detachable pendant offers versatility in styling. Crafted with the highest quality materials and impeccable craftsmanship for generations of wear.
